caption.center: Dennis R. FREEMAN v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Hinds County Circuit Court, First Judicial District, William F. Coleman, Ruling Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Dennis R. Freeman, Parchman, pro se.
Michael C. Moore, Attorney General, Pat S. Flynn, Ass't Attorney General, Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before DAN M. LEE, P.J., and SULLIVAN and PITTMAN, JJ.
